description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2mi6i","text":"This is a protocol for doing extraction of DNA using inexpensive reagents rather than enzymes or kits. It can be used for plant, animal, or fungus samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"8baj3","text":"Forceps (for handling sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pe2p","text":"Pestle (for grinding sample in microtube)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjk32","text":"Hinged 1.5 µL microtubes (3 per sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s7j3","text":"Microcentrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"582lh","text":"Water bath","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tj1","text":"Adjustable micropipette 1-10 μL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7c3c","text":"Adjustable micropipette 10-100 μL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tiqe","text":"Adjustable micropipette 100-1000 μL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flsd0","text":"Pipette tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pof9","text":"Molecular grade water (100 µL per sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq4t9","text":"Silica resin (silica dioxide 50% w/v in water) (3 µL per sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2va48","text":"Wash buffer (diluted 1:1 in 95% ethanol) (1 mL per sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9m4fl","text":"Guanidine Hydrochloride 6M (250 µL per sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
